郰字的基本解释

郰
zōu
同“鄹”。

郰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zōu］
［《廣韻》側鳩切，平尤，莊。］
春秋鲁地，孔子乡邑。在今山东曲阜东南。

郰字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　郰； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1273第17
【唐韻】【正韻】側鳩切【集韻】甾尤切，?音鄒。【說文】魯下邑，孔子之鄕。【左傳·襄十年】郰人紇抉之，以出門者。【註】郰，魯縣。　又姓。【禮·檀弓】孔子少孤，不知其墓，問于郰曼父之母。　又通作鄹。【論語】孰謂鄹人之子知禮乎。　又通作陬。【史記·孔子世家】孔子生魯昌平陬邑。　又【集韻】緒纂切，音選。亭名。在新豐。　俗作?。

考證：〔【禮·檀弓】孔子少孤，不知父墓，問于郰曼父之母。〕　謹照原文父墓改其墓。〔【史記·孔子世家】孔子生于昌平陬邑。〕　謹照原文于改魯。
郰字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
郰字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
郰
zōu
Same as "鄹".
郰
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zōu］
["Guangyun" side dove cut, Pingyou, Zhuang. ]
Lu land in the Spring and Autumn Period, the township of Confucius. In today's southeast of Qufu, Shandong.
郰

[You Ji 2] [Yi Zi Department] 　郰; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1273 Page 17
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Side Dove Cut [Ji Yun] Zi You Cut,? Yin Zou. [Said Wen] Lu Xia Yi, Confucius's iron. [Zuo Zhuan·Xiang Ten Years] Xi Renhe decides to go out. [Note] Xi, Lu County.　Another last name. [Li·Tan Gong] Confucius was a little gu, but he did not know his tomb, and asked Yu Ximan's father and mother.　It's all over again. [The Analects] Who is the son of Huren Zhilihu.　Tong Zuo Zou. 【Historical Records·Confucius Family】Confucius was born in Luchangping Zuoyi.　 [Ji Yun] Xu compilation cut, phonetic selection. Pavilion name. In Xinfeng.　Vulture?. Textual research: [[Li Tan Gong] Confucius Shaogu, not knowing his father's tomb, asked Yu Ximan's father and mother. 〕　I would like to change the tomb of the father's tomb according to the original text. 〔【Historical Records·Confucius Family】Confucius was born in Zoyi, Changping. 〕 　 I would like to follow the original text in Gailu.
